resources.string: I mobile nambar hi contact tracing atân mamawh a ni.

Entirnan, kar kalta khan tu emaw nen puipunna engemaw ah in lo inhnaih viau a, chu mi chu COVID-19 a lo positive reng mai a. 

 India Sorkar chuan ni 14 kalta chhunga kha mi kal tawhna zawng zawng te, he app hmang ve tho midang nena an lo in hnaih tawh dan aṭangin a chhui let ang. 

 Chumi a chhuina aṭanga a lo hnaih tawh ho zawng zawngte chu he app kaltlang hian in test tûrin emaw, mahni lo in khung hrang tûrin hriattirna a thawn ang. 

 He app i lo hman a, contact tracing a i lo tel ve hian COVID-19 darh tûr venna kawngah nasa takin min pui dawn a. I hrisel zawk theihna kawnga hma la tûrin India sawrkar i ṭanpui dawn a ni.
I privacy pawimawh zia hre reng chungin kan theih ang tawkin i data venhim kawngah hma kan la a ni.
Location sharing setting kha 'Always' ah i dah theih chuan duhthusam a ni. He setting hi duh anga thlak theih reng a ni.
I mobile nambar-ah OTP kan thawn e.
I mobile nambar-ah OTP kan thawn nawn leh e.
I phone leh midang phone inhnaih dan monitor-na atân a ni a. On reng theih chuan duhthusam a ni.
I Data hi India Sawrkar hnenah chauh a awm a.\nEng lai mahin he app hian i hming leh nambar hi vantlang hriat theih in a dah chhuak lo.
Eng ṭawng nge i hman thlang rawh le\nकृपया अपनी भाषा चुनें
Ṭawng pakhat tal i thlan a ngai.
Phone nambar dik tak enter rawh
Covid19 vei tih finfiah \n tawh nen intawng ta la, \n hriattir i duh a ngem?
Mitinin mahni theuhvin India rama \nCoronavirus darh tur hi \nkan veng thei.

A awlsam zawngin,
1. App %s la 
2. %s on la
3. %s hi ‘Always’ ah dah la 

I ṭhiante leh chhungte 
app install tûrin sawm ve rawh.
Aarogya Setu hian Bluetooth leh Location hmangin COVID-19 positive mi tu emaw nen in in hnaih emaw insîk dan te a track a ni .
He App kaltlanga alert ken tel te\nI inrinhlelh hun leh ṭanpuina i ngaih huna tih tûr leh \n Mahnia in khung hran dan
Covid19 vei tih finfiah tawh nen, \n i hria emaw hrelo emaw, inhnaih taka \n in awm chuan hriattîr i ni ang.
Aarogya Setu hmang hian, nangmah, i chhungte leh ṭhiante \n i humhim thei a, tin rampum \nCOVID-19 dona kawngah i pui thei bawk a ni
India a lo him zawk nan hma i la duh a nih chuan, khawngaihin heTerms of Service leh Privacy Policy hi i pawmpui tih lantir nan a hnuaia button hi click rawh le:
Log-in dawnin harsatna a awm tlat
OTP i enter kha a dik lo
Han tum leh chhin ta che
Update thei lo. Tap to retry.
Contact tracing atân bluetooth leh i location hmanga midang i hnaih leh i sîk te data hi India sawrkar hnenah share a ni ang.
I data hi i phone-ah a in save reng a. I data hi India Sawrkar server ah him taka i share ṭul hun a awm, chu chu…
Enchhin tûrin sample lak tawh a ni
Covid19 vei tih finfiah a ni
Bluetooth leh Location services hmanga data lakkhawm te chu Government of India hnen ah thawn mek a ni.
I data India Sawrkar server-ah him takin a awm tawh e.
Engemaw fuh lo a awm. Lo ti ṭha leh teh.
I lo him zawk nan he app hian bluetooth leh location permission a mamawh a, i phone settings aṭangin heng hi i ON thei ang.
Location settings-ah phalna a la kim tawk lova. I phone settings-ah thlak a ngai.
I him zawk nan bluetooth in ON reng a ngai.
I phone in internet connection a neih a ngai.
Login thei lo. Ti ṭha leh rawh
COVID-19 positive i nih emaw, test mek i nih chauhin share tur
A thlawna COVID-19 chungchanga Health ministry biak theihna
Midang hriselna dinhmun en tûrin QR Code hmangin scan rawh
Kan hriselna dinhmun enna QR code scan na
QR code refresh nan hmet rawh
Official Aarogya Setu app aṭanga generate a ni lo.
Code generate ṭha turin lo dil leh rawh
kai theihna a sang lutuk lo
Covid19 vei tih finfiah a ni
Qr code lak nan i phone-ah permission set a la ngai
QR code scan turin Camera permission a ngai.
Harsatna a awm. Khawngaih in han ti leh teh.
A thil tih theih tam tak : Helpline, Privacy leh thil dang dang hmuh theihin a awm nual ang.
